titleStmt.title: An alarm to the present men in power, the officers of the army, and all oppressors, from some oppressed people of England, on the behalf of themselves and others.
titleStmt.author: North, John.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Joh. North, Gervas North. Joh. Freeman, Tim Freeman.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "this libell scatterd abroad in ye streets in ye night tyme"; "May. 26:".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
